summary: This document is an email correspondence discussing financial arrangements related to an LLC account at TD Ameritrade. It includes communication between Richard Kahn and Chad Markland regarding the opening of a credit card and the management of the LLC account.

persons.name: Richard Kahn
persons.context: Richard Kahn is involved in a discussion about financial arrangements for an LLC account.

persons.name: Chad Markland
persons.context: Chad Markland provides information on how to manage the LLC account and offers assistance regarding credit card options.

persons.name: Uka Saran
persons.context: Uka Saran is mentioned as a contact for the LLC account at TD Ameritrade.

connections.description: Richard Kahn is seeking financial advice from Chad Markland regarding the LLC account.
Chad Markland refers to Uka Saran as a senior consultant at TD Ameritrade, indicating a professional relationship.

locations: 575 Lexington Avenue, 4th Floor, New York, NY 10022
255 Alhambra Circle, Ste. 120, Coral Gables, FL 33134
keyFacts: Richard Kahn is discussing financial options for an LLC account with Chad Markland.
Chad Markland provides information on opening a credit card and managing the LLC account.
Uka Saran is identified as a senior financial consultant associated with the LLC account.
